Episodes.Title: Fruity Fun
Episodes.Plot: It's been raining outside and so Jeff suggests that The Wiggles and their friends paint pictures. Greg will join the pictures together and make a story to match the paintings.
Episodes.GuestStars: Elefterios Kourtis,  Caterina Mete,  Ryan De Saulnier,  Ben Murray,  Brett Clarke

Episodes.Title: Let's Have A Dance
Episodes.Plot:
Dorothy?s Dancing Alphabet features the letter A.
The Wiggles and friends paint pictures at Wigglehouse, and Greg connects them to form a story.
In Little Wiggles, Jeff can?t find his piano, but Murray has invented a locating device.Song List
1. We Like To Say Hello
2. Rock a bye your bear
3. Five Little Joeys
4. Dorothy (Would you like to dance?)
5. Ensalada de Fruta Fresca (Fruit Salad) - animated
6. Havenu Shalom Alechem.
7. The Monkey Dance ? concert version
Episodes.Writer: Greg Page, Anthony Field, Paul Field

Episodes.Title: The Wiggle Way
Episodes.Plot:
Murray shares about the time the Wiggles first moved into Wigglehouse and everyone helped move in furniture and other items. Dorothy?s Dancing Alphabet is about the letter C, for the Captain?s dance. The Little Wiggles play cricket but need a bowler.Song List
1. Get Ready To Wiggle
2. We?re dancing with Wags the Dog - concert
3. A frog went a walking - animated
4. Georgia?s song
5. Having fun at the beach
6. Romp Bomp a Stomp
7. El baile del chango (the monkey dance) ? Mariachi Wiggles
8. Lights

Episodes.Title: Soccer Time/Watching the Ponies
Episodes.Plot:
Captain Feathersword's crew have a soccer match against the Mascots. The letter D is featured, with Anthony doing a Dinosaur Dance.Song List
1. Take a Trip Out on the Sea
2. Go, Captain Feathersword, Ahoy!
3. Move like an emu
4. Move your arms like Henry
5. Ponies
6. Uncle Noah's Ark
7. Brown girl in the ring
8. Rock a bye your bear
Episodes.GuestStars: Ryan De Saulnier,  Ben Murray,  Caterina Mete,  Brett Clarke

Episodes.Title: A Wiggly Concert
Episodes.Plot:
Anthony tells a story about his fellow Wiggles and friends. The Little Wiggles deal with a powered-down radio. Dorothy's Dancing Alphabet features the letter E. Captain Feathersword sails around to find the pirate sandhills.Song List
1. Doing the Flap
1b. Bonus - Twinkle, Twinkle, Little Star
2. Haru Ga Kita
3. Toot Toot
4. Wake Up, Jeff!
5. Cuak Cuak - Mariachi Wiggles
6. Rolling down the sandhills / Running up the sandhills
